# Aether PBR

[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/Modrinth-0E1115?style=for-the-badge&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,)](https://modrinth.com/mod/aether-pbr)
[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/Curse_Forege-0E1115?style=for-the-badge&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,)](https://legacy.curseforge.com/minecraft/texture-packs/aether-pbr)  
PBR Resource pack for [The Aether](https://modrinth.com/mod/aether) mod
